com.google.gwt.user.client.ui

    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    DialogBox
    A form of popup that has a caption area at the top and can be dragged by the user.
    class 
    MouseListenerAdapter
    Deprecated.
    use MouseDownHandler, MouseUpHandler, MouseOverHandler, MouseMoveHandler, and/or MouseOutHandler instead
